DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct compare effectiveness safety mometasone nasal spray daily twice daily amoxicillin placebo treat sign symptom acute rhinosinusitis . Patients receive mometasone nasal spray 2 spray per nostril daily , 2 spray per nostril twice daily , amoxicillin 500 mg three time day , placebo three time day . Patients nasal spray treat 15 day patient amoxicillin placebo treat 10 day . All patient followed-up 14-day no-treatment observation period .
